hero.subtitle: Join our mission to help children in difficult situations through charitable actions and solidarity events.

about.title: About Us
about.description:
The SOS Children's Village Ambassadors Club of ISIMS is a student association committed to charitable actions for disadvantaged children. Our mission is to raise awareness in the university community about the challenges facing children in difficulty and to raise funds to support SOS Village d'Enfants initiatives.

Founded in 2022, our club regularly organizes events, fundraising campaigns and awareness activities to provide concrete support to children in need.

items.title: Awareness
items.description: Raise awareness in the university community about children's issues and SOS Village d'Enfants actions.

items.title: Solidarity
items.description: Promote values of solidarity and mutual aid within the university and beyond.

items.title: Fundraising
items.description: Organize events and activities to raise funds for SOS Village d'Enfants.

items.title: Student Engagement
items.description: Encourage student engagement in charitable and civic actions.

items.title: National Network
items.description: Build a strong network between different SOS Village d'Enfants clubs in Tunisian universities.

items.title: Events
items.description: Organize regular events (conferences, workshops, recreational activities) for children supported by SOS Village.
